title: venkaTEshvara yAdava
sahitya:
venkaTEshvara yAdava bhUpatim AshrayEham vishva vikalpApaham 
vidvajjana kalpa bhUruham vadana sarasIruham


caraNam   kankashaila madhyasthita kArtikEya shiva guruguha karuNA kaTAkSa pAtram kanjadaLAyata 
nEtram kankaNa hAra kirITAlankrta sundara gAtram kAncana vrSTiprada mEgha ranjita bahu kSEtram 
pankaja bhavamukha surakrta sakaLa niSkaLa stOtram sankalpa vikalpa rahita saccidAnanda mAtram
